Banda.definition: Small music ensemble used as a supplement to the orchestra in an opera
Banda.zh: 歌剧中作为管弦乐队补充的小型乐团

Concertino.definition: Smaller, more virtuosic group of musicians in a concerto grosso
Concertino.zh: 规模较小，但技艺精湛的音乐家团体演奏大协奏曲

Convenienze.definition: Rules relating to the ranking of singers in opera (primo, secondo, comprimario) in 19th-century Italian opera, and the number of scenes, arias, etc. that they were entitled to expect.[2] The convenienze are referred to in the Donizetti opera Le convenienze ed inconvenienze teatrali.
Convenienze.zh: 与19世纪意大利歌剧中歌剧演员的排名（primo、secondo、comprimario）有关的规则。

Ripieno.definition: The larger group of musicians in a concerto grosso
Ripieno.zh: 在大协奏曲中的更多的音乐家
